pr_title: Add permissions defaults to plugin.yml for op-affecting commands

timeline.author: triagonal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -564,3 +564,74 @@ permissions:
   essentials.keepinv:
     default: false
     description: Controls whether players keep their inventory on death.
+  essentials.keepexp:

timeline.message:
Add permissions defaults to plugin.yml for op-affecting commands

This aims to reduce the unintended consequences of granting all
Essentials permissions.
